faqs.question: What is Okal?
faqs.answer: Okal is an instant grocery delivery app that brings fresh groceries, fruits, vegetables, and essentials to your doorstep within minutes.

faqs.question: What are Okal's delivery hours?
faqs.answer: Okal delivers from 6 AM to 12 midnight in most cities. Timings may vary by location and local regulations.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum order value for delivery?
faqs.answer: Yes, minimum order value depends on your area. It’s displayed at checkout and may differ for free delivery.

faqs.question: How can I contact Okal customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach support via in-app chat under 'Help & Support' or email support@okal.in. We’re available 24x7.

faqs.question: Does Okal deliver in my area?
faqs.answer: Enter your address in the Okal app to check delivery availability. We're expanding service zones frequently.

faqs.question: How can I update my address or profile details?
faqs.answer: You can manage addresses and profile info under 'My Account' > 'Profile' or 'Addresses'.

faqs.question: Is there a membership or subscription plan on Okal?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal Plus offers free deliveries, exclusive deals, and priority support for subscribers.

faqs.question: Does Okal charge any delivery fee?
faqs.answer: Delivery charges vary depending on order value and location. Members often get free delivery.

faqs.question: How long does Okal take to deliver an order?
faqs.answer: Most Okal orders arrive within 10–20 minutes, depending on stock and distance.

faqs.question: Can I schedule an order for later?
faqs.answer: Scheduled deliveries aren’t available yet but will be added soon for select products.

faqs.question: Can I track my order in real-time?
faqs.answer: Yes, live order tracking is available on the Okal app once your order is picked up.

faqs.question: Can I delete my Okal account?
faqs.answer: You can delete your account under 'Privacy Settings' or contact support for assistance.

faqs.question: Does Okal offer corporate or bulk orders?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal supports large or corporate orders. Contact support@okal.in for details.

faqs.question: How do I rate my delivery or provide feedback?
faqs.answer: After your order, you’ll be prompted to rate the experience or report any issues via 'My Orders'.

faqs.question: How do I change my phone number linked to Okal?
faqs.answer: Go to 'Profile Settings' and update your mobile number. Verification via OTP will be required.

faqs.question: Can I have multiple addresses under one account?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can save multiple addresses and choose one during checkout.

faqs.question: What if I forget my password?
faqs.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' option on login. You’ll receive an OTP or reset link to create a new password.

faqs.question: Is my personal data safe with Okal?
faqs.answer: Yes, Okal follows strict privacy and security policies to protect your data. Read our Privacy Policy for details.

faqs.question: Can I have multiple accounts on the same phone?
faqs.answer: A phone number can be linked to only one Okal account.

faqs.question: How do I stop receiving promotional notifications?
faqs.answer: Go to 'App Settings' > 'Notifications' and disable promotional alerts.

faqs.question: Does Okal deliver alcohol, meat, or medicines?
faqs.answer: Okal delivers groceries and essentials only. Some locations may deliver age-restricted items like alcohol where legally permitted.

faqs.question: Can I order from two stores in one order?
faqs.answer: Currently, you can order from one store per checkout. For items from another store, place a separate order.

faqs.question: Is there a helpline for delivery partners?
faqs.answer: Yes, delivery partners have a separate helpline accessible through the partner app.

faqs.question: Does Okal have a web version for ordering?
faqs.answer: Currently, Okal operates via mobile apps. A web version may be available in future.
